ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Bronze) + <2> Nikon 55-200mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Spare EN-EL14 Battery + <6> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <7> Additional Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter +
<8> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <9> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <10> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <11> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<12> HB-45 Lens Hood + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
